name: Do Unto Others
description:
Do Unto Others is a fighting game with a twist: Every action you take towards one player ends up affecting the other player instead. How can you beat your opponent when every attack ends up backfiring? Think outside the box, it's a reverse psychology party brawler!

- Play with 1 or 2 players on a single keyboard. Use WASD or the arrow keys!

- Full support for gamepads.

- 13 levels full of unique mechanics.

Concept & Game Design by Tom Cheshire & Sean Rugg

Programming by Tom Cheshire

Art & Sound by Sean Rugg

This is our entry for the second annual GMTK Game Jam. The theme was 'genre without mechanic.' We had a great time working on this! For more from us, check out our websites:

https://www.tomcheshire.com/

http://seanrugg.com/
